product_name: Yakima HoldUp +2 Bike Rack Add-On Extension
long_description: Bringing 4 bikes along on family road trips or outings with your cycling buddies? The Yakima HoldUp +2 Bike Rack Add-On extension increases the capacity of your HoldUp 2 bike rack from 2 bikes to 4.
short_description: Bringing 4 bikes along on family road trips or outings with your cycling buddies? The Yakima HoldUp +2 Bike Rack Add-On extension increases the capacity of your HoldUp 2 bike rack from 2 bikes to 4.
